name: Glitch War (itch)
description:
Glitch War is a 2D strategy game where you command units to defeat the enemy. There are  21 usable units and 7 playable characters through more than 30 unique levels!

Let me know what you think about the game! What to know what I am currently working on? Check out my patreon!  https://www.patreon.com/user?u=7205916
